name: part_004
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ卒業ライブ】あくあ色に染まれ！／MinatoAqua Graduation LIVE [fDtUy1PTor0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Opening cinematic with Minato Aqua in a realistic office setting.
Minato Aqua narrates over cinematic shots of the empty office.
Interview question text appears on screen.
A large group photo of Hololive members is shown with the text 'A place where I belong'.
Minato Aqua performs 'Kaerimichi wa Toomawari Shitaku Naru' alongside Subaru, Choco, Ayame, and Noel.

subtitles.original: ここは、一人の女の子が夢を追いかけた場所
subtitles.english: This is the place where a girl chased her dream.

subtitles.original: ここは、一人の女の子が夢を掴んだ場所
subtitles.english: This is the place where a girl grasped her dream.

subtitles.original: そしてここは、一人の女の子が新たな道を歩み出す場所
subtitles.english: And this is the place where a girl takes her first steps on a new path.

subtitles.original: 湊あくあさんにとってホロライブとは？
subtitles.english: What is Hololive to Minato Aqua?

subtitles.original: 居場所
subtitles.english: A place where I belong.

subtitles.original: 居場所
subtitles.english: A place where I belong.

subtitles.original: 好きだった　この場所
subtitles.english: I loved this place.

subtitles.original: やめられない漫画を途中で閉じて
subtitles.english: Closing the manga I couldn't put down,

subtitles.original: 顔を上げて　気づくように
subtitles.english: Looking up to realize it.

subtitles.original: 居心地いい日向もいつの間にか
subtitles.english: Even the cozy sunny spot, before I knew it,

subtitles.original: 影になってた　黄昏（たそがれ）る
subtitles.english: had turned into a shadow at dusk.

subtitles.original: 君と会って
subtitles.english: Meeting you...

subtitles.original: 過ぎる時間忘れるくらい夢中で話した
subtitles.english: we talked so much, forgetting the time.

subtitles.original: 僕の夢は
subtitles.english: My dream is...

subtitles.original: ここではない　どこかへ
subtitles.english: to go somewhere that isn't here.

subtitles.original: 帰り道は　帰り道は
subtitles.english: The way home, the way home...

subtitles.original: 遠回りをしたくなるよ
subtitles.english: makes me want to take a detour.

subtitles.original: どこ行けば　どこに着くか?
subtitles.english: Where will I end up if I go there?

subtitles.original: 過去の道なら　迷うことがないから
subtitles.english: On the paths of the past, I never get lost.

subtitles.original: 弱虫
subtitles.english: A coward,

subtitles.original: 新しい世界へ
subtitles.english: towards a new world.

subtitles.original: 今　行きたい　行きたい
subtitles.english: I want to go now, I want to go.

subtitles.original: 強くなりたい
subtitles.english: I want to become strong.

subtitles.original: 好きだった　この場所
subtitles.english: I loved this place.

subtitles.original: 一歩目　踏み出そう
subtitles.english: Let's take the first step.

subtitles.original: 街明かりが寂しくと感じるのは
subtitles.english: The city lights feel lonely

subtitles.original: 見慣れた景色と違うから
subtitles.english: because the view is different from what I know.

subtitles.original: いつもの交差点が見えなくなって
subtitles.english: The usual intersection is out of sight,

subtitles.original: どこにいるかわからない
subtitles.english: and I don't know where I am.

subtitles.original: 人は誰も　変わることになれていなくて
subtitles.english: No one is used to things changing,

subtitles.original: 昨日と同じように
subtitles.english: just like yesterday,

subtitles.original: 今日も
subtitles.english: today

subtitles.original: 明日も
subtitles.english: and tomorrow,

subtitles.original: ここにいたくなるんだ
subtitles.english: they want to stay here.

subtitles.original: 知らない道
subtitles.english: An unknown path...

subtitles.original: あと何回　歩けるだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder how many more times I can walk it.

subtitles.original: 夢の方へ
subtitles.english: Towards dreams,

subtitles.original: 愛の方へ
subtitles.english: towards love.

subtitles.original: 風は道を選んだりはしないよ
subtitles.english: The wind doesn't choose its path.

subtitles.original: このまま　このまま
subtitles.english: Just as it is, just as it is,

subtitles.original: ワンウェイの標識
subtitles.english: a one-way sign.

subtitles.original: でも　行くんだ　行くんだ
subtitles.english: But I'm going, I'm going,

subtitles.original: 戻れなくても
subtitles.english: even if I can't return.

subtitles.original: 君と離れるのは　悲しいけど
subtitles.english: It's sad to be apart from you,

subtitles.original: 大事な別れだ
subtitles.english: but it's an important parting.

subtitles.original: もともと広い世界
subtitles.english: The world was wide to begin with,

subtitles.original: 知らなきゃいけない
subtitles.english: and I have to see it.

subtitles.original: いつかきっと
subtitles.english: Someday, for sure,

subtitles.original: 違う道を選んだ
subtitles.english: we'll know we chose different paths

subtitles.original: 輝く未来のためと　互いにわかるだろう
subtitles.english: for the sake of a bright future.

subtitles.original: 風のように
subtitles.english: Like the wind,

subtitles.original: 風のように
subtitles.english: like the wind,

subtitles.original: 思いのままに生きてみよう
subtitles.english: let's try to live as we please.

subtitles.original: 過去がどんな　眩しくても
subtitles.english: No matter how bright the past may be,

subtitles.original: 未来はもっと眩しいかもしれない
subtitles.english: the future might be even brighter.

subtitles.original: 帰り道は　帰り道は
subtitles.english: The way home, the way home...

subtitles.original: 遠回りをしたくなるよ
subtitles.english: makes me want to take a detour.

subtitles.original: どこ行けば　どこに着くか?
subtitles.english: Where will I end up if I go there?

subtitles.original: 過去の道なら　迷うことがないから
subtitles.english: On the paths of the past, I never get lost.

subtitles.original: 弱虫
subtitles.english: A coward,

subtitles.original: 新しい世界へ
subtitles.english: towards a new world.

subtitles.original: 今　行きたい　行きたい
subtitles.english: I want to go now, I want to go.

subtitles.original: 強くなりたい
subtitles.english: I want to become strong.

subtitles.original: 好きだった　この場所
subtitles.english: I loved this place.
